# Merging SPF records

original record:

v=spf1 +a +mx +ip4:139.162.186.93 ~all


 mailerlite.com spf record :

v=spf1 include:_spf.mlsend.com +a +mx +ip4:139.162.186.93 ~all


merging record:

v=spf1 include:_spf.mlsend.com +a +mx +ip4:139.162.186.93 ~all

**Result**: mergin record was automaticaly generated by mailerlite.com service!
